Affordable is an approved IRS Continuing Education Provider. Learn More >

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Member of the Business Consumer Alliance” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/bca-accred.svg” alt=”Business Consumer Alliance Logo – Proud Member” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”BCA Business Consumer Alliance” _builder_version=”4.23.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22body_link_text_color%22%93}”]

Affordable Tax Relief is a proud member of the Business Consumer Alliance. The BCA, an independent, non-profit organization, shares our commitment to ethical business practices and integrity. Check Our Report >

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”10x “Top Workplace” Honoree” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/top-workplaceaccred.svg” alt=”Top Workplace Award Logo | Orange County Register” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”Top Workplaces” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” link_option_url_new_window=”on” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Affordable is the ten-time Top Workplace winner. This award celebrates nationally recognized companies that make the world a better place to work by prioritizing a people-centered culture and giving employees a voice. A list of recipients is available on the OC Register website.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”National Association Of Enrolled Agents” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/naea-accred.svg” alt=”NAEA Official Logo” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”NAEA” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Affordable is a member of the National Association of Enrolled Agents (NAEA). The leading national organization representing enrolled agents, its members are licensed by the U.S. Department of the Treasury to represent taxpayers before all administrative levels of the Internal Revenue Service (IRS), including examination, collection, and appeals functions.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Licensed In All 50 States” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/poa-accred.svg” alt=”IRS Power of Attorney Logo for All 50 States” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”IRS Power of Attorney 50 States” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We serve taxpayers throughout the entire United States. Our tax attorneys and enrolled agents are licensed to represent taxpayers before the IRS in all 50 states. We can also legally represent U.S. taxpayers living abroad. So wherever you are, Affordable can help you resolve issues with back taxes and other IRS matters.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”6x GOLD Stevie Award Recipient” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/stevie-accred.svg” alt=”Gold Stevie Award for Customer Service” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”6x Gold Stevie Winner” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22body_link_text_color%22%93}”]

Affordable Tax Relief is the recipient of six Gold Stevie Awards® for excellence in customer service. Bestowed to companies that have proven they’re head and shoulders above the competition when it comes to delivering client care, helpful technologies, and services that improve the lives of their clients. View the Stevie Awards Ceremony >

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Civic 50 – 6x Honoree” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/civic50-accred.svg” alt=”CIvic 50 Badge Award” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”Civic 50 Award” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22body_link_text_color%22%93}”]

Being named a Civic 50 company is one of our proudest achievements. Awarded by the nonprofit organization Points of Light, Civic 50 recognizes the nation’s most community-minded companies. This award speaks to our amazing employees and their enthusiastic participation in our year-round charitable fundraising and volunteering initiatives.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Rated Best Tax Relief by SuperMoney” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/sm-accred.svg” alt=”SuperMoney Logo + Rated Best Tax Relief Firm Tagline” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”Supermoney” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22body_link_text_color%22%93}”]

Affordable is the top-rated tax relief firm on SuperMoney.com, with their financial experts giving us their coveted “strongly recommended” stamp of approval.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”8x Comparably Award Recipient” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/comparably-accred-1.svg” alt=”Comparably – 8x Award Recipient” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”Supermoney” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-d93e6542-feeb-4c58-af79-193a44a94a54%22:%91%22body_link_text_color%22%93}”]

Comparably.com has honored Affordable with eight awards, including Best Company for Diversity, Best Company Culture, Best Company for Work-Life Balance, Best for Career Growth, Best HR Teams, and Best CEO. Full List of our awards here.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”40px||40px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Inc. 5000 – 7x Honoree” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/inc-5000-accred.svg” alt=”Inc. 5000 Logo | Ranked #1 Financial Services Company by Inc. Magazine | 7x Winner” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”Inc. 5000″ _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_margin_phone=”-40px||||false|false” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Affordable’s a proud seven-time INC. 5000 honoree. We’ve earned our multiple placements on Inc. Magazine’s highly-regarded honor roll by dedicating ourselves to providing excellence for every client, every time. No exceptions.

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_divider color=”#CECECE” divider_weight=”0.5px” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.23.1″ _module_preset=”default” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”50px||||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.22.1″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_blurb title=”Awarded Best Online Experience by CNBC” image=”https://affordabletaxrelief.com/wp-content/uploads/2025/08/cnbc-select-stack.svg” alt=”cnbc-select” image_icon_width=”20%” content_max_width=”440px” admin_label=”CNBC Select” _builder_version=”4.27.4″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h3″ header_font=”||||||||” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”16px” body_text_align=”center” image_icon_custom_margin=”||||false|false” image_icon_custom_padding=”50px||65px||false|false” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ border_radii=”on|8px|8px|8px|8px” border_width_all=”1px” border_color_all=”RGBA(255,255,255,0)” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}” image_icon_custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” sticky_enabled=”0″ image_icon_custom_padding_phone=”30px||45px||false|false” image_icon_custom_padding_tablet=”50px||65px||false|false”]

CNBC named Affordable to its Best Tax Relief Companies list along with special honors for providing consumers with the best online experience in the industry.

excerpt.rendered:  HomeAffordable’s AccreditationsAffordable Tax Relief’sAccreditations & AwardsExpertise, experience, and excellence – elevating Affordable above the rest.Affordable Tax Relief is the only tax resolution firm to win the Better Business Bureau’s International Torch Award for Ethics. The BBB’s most prestigious award, it’s bestowed to companies that are worldwide leaders in ethical business practices and social responsibility. […]
